paper_abstract: A fast implicit QR algorithm for eigenvalue computation of low rank corrections of Hermitian matrices is adjusted to work with matrix pencils arising from zerofinding problems for polynomials expressed in Chebyshev-like bases. The modified QZ algorithm computes the generalized eigenvalues of certain rank structured matrix pencils using flops and memory storage. Numerical experiments and comparisons confirm the effectiveness and the stability of the proposed method.
paper_title: Implicit QR for rank-structured matrix pencils
